datasets.name: 5154cebc
datasets.query:
--  select distinct(turbine_id) as turbine_id from `idriss_ouazzani`.`dbdemos_iot_turbine`.turbine where turbine_id is not null

-- hardcode list of ID from the fixed dataset to avoid widget issue during import. 
SELECT turbine_id
FROM workspace.dbdemos_iot_turbine.spark_turbine;

datasets.name: 7f9ec29d
datasets.query:
select *, CASE WHEN prediction = 'ok' THEN 'Healthy' ELSE CONCAT('Faulty (', prediction, ')') END as status 
  from workspace.dbdemos_iot_turbine.spark_current_turbine_metrics

frame.title: Histogram A - IOT platform - turbine sensors
